attributes.action: A People's vote of No Confidence in All  MPs sitting in The Houses of Parliament
attributes.background: Due to Fiasco of the Brexit negotiations and the lack of consideration for what was voted for in the Referendum of 2016 a vote of No Confidence in the current MPs

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you mean by a vote of no confidence in all sitting MPs.

There's already a petition calling for a general election. You might like to sign this petition. You are more likely to get action on an issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
